metadata.displayName: Retention days to deploy Auditing on SQL servers(optional, 180 days if unspecified)
metadata.description: The value in days of the retention period (0 indicates unlimited retention)

metadata.displayName: Resource group name for storage accounts to deploy Auditing on SQL servers
metadata.description: Auditing writes database events to an audit log in your Azure Storage account (a storage account will be created in each region where a SQL Server is created that will be shared by all servers in that region). Important - for proper operation of Auditing do not delete or rename the resource group or the storage accounts.

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics workspace to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Windows VM Scale Sets (VMSS)
metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of VM images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Windows VM Scale Sets (VMSS)
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics workspace to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Linux VM Scale Sets (VMSS)
metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of VM images that have supported Linux OS to add to scope to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Linux VM Scale Sets (VMSS)
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Storage Account Prefix for Regional Storage Account
metadata.description: This prefix will be combined with the network security group location to form the created storage account name.

metadata.displayName: Resource Group Name for Storage Account (must exist)
metadata.description: The resource group that the storage account will be created in. This resource group must already exist.

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics workspace to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Linux VMs
metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of VM images that have supported Linux OS to add to scope to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Linux VMs
metadata.description: Example value: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics workspace to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Windows VMs
metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.

metadata.displayName: Optional: List of VM images that have supported Windows OS to add to scope to deploy Log Analytics Agent for Windows VMs
metadata.description: Example values: '/subscriptions/<subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/YourResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/ContosoStdImage'

metadata.displayName: List of users that must be included in Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of members that should be included in the Administrators local group. Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of users excluded from Windows VM Administrators group
metadata.description: A semicolon-separated list of users that should be excluded in the Administrators local group; Ex: Administrator; myUser1; myUser2

metadata.displayName: List of resource types that should have diagnostic logs enabled
Log Analytics workspace ID for VM agent reporting
metadata.description: This is the Id (GUID) of the Log Analytics Workspace that the VMs should be configured for

metadata.displayName: List of regions where Network Watcher should be enabled
metadata.description: To see a complete list of regions use Get-AzLocation

metadata.displayName: Minimum TLS version for Windows web servers
metadata.description: The minimum TLS protocol version that should be enabled on Windows web servers

metadata.displayName: Latest PHP version
metadata.description: Latest supported PHP version for App Services

metadata.displayName: Latest Java version
Latest Windows Python version
Latest Linux Python version
Optional: List of Windows VM images that support Log Analytics agent to add to audit scope
Optional: List of Linux VM images that support Log Analytics agent to add to audit scope
